scripts.install: (./composer/hlfv1/downloadFabric.sh) & (cd server && npm install) & (cd composer/bna && npm install) & (cd client && npm install)
scripts.test: npm run test-server && npm run test-composer
scripts.lint: (cd client && ng lint) & (cd server && npm run lint) & (cd composer/bna && npm run lint)
scripts.validate-commit: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [ $branch == 'master' ]; then echo "You can't commit directly to master branch"; exit 1; fi & npm run lint & npm run test
